about_the_game:
The Way of Death is a souls-like game set in a world inspired by feudal Japan from the Edo period. Take the challenge in the arcade sword combat system prepared for a top-down perspective. Defeat opponents and bosses, and explore full of secrets surroundings.

MAIN FEATURES

MYSTERIOUS WORLD
Walk across mysterious terrain and reveal its secrets. Perhaps, the reality is not as simple as it seems. Do not be afraid to get off the main path; maybe you will find something unexpected.

SKILFUL COMBAT SYSTEM
Your sword is the most helpful tool to survive. Learn how to use it and become a better swordsman. You will be surrounded by dangerous monsters many times. The proper tactic is required to beat them. Also, thrilling duels on swords await you. Parry all the hits and beat the enemy.

DEATH IS NOT THE OVER
Death is an inherent element of the game. When you die, you will reborn in the last hot source you visited. All enemies will revive too. Don't give up, and try again.

short_description: Go on a path crucial for your honor. Pass through dangerous areas to complete your destiny. Duel against enemy warriors and kill dangerous Yokai creatures. Practice in sword combat to become a better swordsman.
